turnover.title: Turnover
turnover.description: The taxings, fees, sales or money earned by your business

other.title: Other
other.description: Any other business income not included in turnover

coGBought.title: Cost of goods bought
coGBought.description: Cost of goods bough for resale or goods used

staffCosts.title: Staff costs
staffCosts.description: Wages, salaries and other staff costs

premisesRunningCosts.title: Premisis running costs
premisesRunningCosts.description: Rent, rates, power and insurance costs

maintenanceCosts.title: Maintenance costs
maintenanceCosts.description: Repairs and renewals of property and equipment

adminCosts.title: Admin costs
adminCosts.description: Phone, fax, stationery and other office costs

interest.title: Interest on bank and other loans

financialCharges.title: Financial charges
financialCharges.description: Bank, credit cord and other financial charges

professionalFees.title: Professional fees
professionalFees.description: Accountancy, legal and other professional fees

depreciation.title: Depreciation
depreciation.description: Depreciation and loss/profit on sales of assets

bpra.title: BPRA
bpra.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (only where Business Premisis Renovation Allowance has been claimed)

other.title: Other
other.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (where you have disposed of assets for more than their tax value)
